name: Learning Output Style
description: Interactive learning mode that requests meaningful code contributions at decision points (mimics the unshipped Learning output style)
longDescription: Installs a session-start hook (shell script) that injects instructions turning Claude into a guided coding tutor. At decision points involving business logic, error handling, algorithms, or architectural choices, Claude pauses, prepares file context and function signatures, explains the trade-offs, and asks you to write 5-10 lines of meaningful code. Recreates the unshipped Learning output style.
